title: Cloud Giant Smiling One
contents: property | Saving Throws | Con +10, Int +6, Cha +7
property | Skills | Deception+ 11, Insight +7, Perception +7, Sleight of Hand +9
description | Innate Spellcasting | The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
description | At will | detect magic, fog cloud, light
description | 3/day each | feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis
description | 1/day each | control weather, gaseous form

description | Spellcasting | The giant is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The giant has the following bard spells prepared:
description | Cantrips (at will) | minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
description | 1st level (4 slots) | cure wounds, disguise self, silent image, Tasha's hideous laughter
description | 3rd level (2 slots) | major image, tongues
description | Keen Smell | The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
description | Multiattack | The giant makes two attacks with its morningstar.

description | Morningstar | Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft ., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

description | Rock | Ranged Weapon Attack:+ 12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

description | Fling | The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet ofit. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice and land prone, taking 1d8 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

description | Wind Aura | A magical aura of wind surrounds the giant. The aura is a l 0-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as the giant maintains concentration on it (as if concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, the giant gains a +2 bonus to its AC against ranged weapon attacks, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

description | Change Shape | The giant magically polymorphs into a beast or humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Any equipment the giant is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
